paragraph: Yu Yamada (山田 優, Yamada Yū, born July 5, 1984, Okinawa) is a Japanese model, actress and singer best known from her modeling work with CanCam magazine.
On March 14, 2012, Yamada married Japanese actor Shun Oguri, and is a mother of three children, as of April 2020, according to reports made by an undisclosed acquaintance.
Kiseki wa Sora Kara Futte Kuru (2005) as Reiko Aoyama
Surf's Up (Japanese dub) (2007) as Lani Aliikai
Aisuru Tame ni Aisaretai Loved to Love (2003)
Sore wa, Totsuzen, Arashi no youni... (2004)
